# Builds the MSP430 support library
add_library(msp430_driverlib STATIC
  adc10_a.c
  adc10_a.h
  adc12_a.c
  adc12_a.h
  aes.c
  aes.h
  battbak.c
  battbak.h
  comp_b.c
  comp_b.h
  crc.c
  crc.h
  ctsd16.c
  ctsd16.h
  dac12_a.c
  dac12_a.h
  dma.c
  dma.h
  driverlib.h
  eusci_a_spi.c
  eusci_a_spi.h
  eusci_a_uart.c
  eusci_a_uart.h
  eusci_b_i2c.c
  eusci_b_i2c.h
  eusci_b_spi.c
  eusci_b_spi.h
  flashctl.c
  flashctl.h
  gpio.c
  gpio.h
  inc
  lcd_b.c
  lcd_b.h
  ldopwr.c
  ldopwr.h
  mpy32.c
  mpy32.h
  oa.c
  oa.h
  pmap.c
  pmap.h
  pmm.c
  pmm.h
  ram.c
  ram.h
  ref.c
  ref.h
  rtc_a.c
  rtc_a.h
  rtc_b.c
  rtc_b.h
  rtc_c.c
  rtc_c.h
  sd24_b.c
  sd24_b.h
  sfr.c
  sfr.h
  sysctl.c
  sysctl.h
  tec.c
  tec.h
  timer_a.c
  timer_a.h
  timer_b.c
  timer_b.h
  timer_d.c
  timer_d.h
  tlv.c
  tlv.h
  ucs.c
  ucs.h
  usci_a_spi.c
  usci_a_spi.h
  usci_a_uart.c
  usci_a_uart.h
  usci_b_i2c.c
  usci_b_i2c.h
  usci_b_spi.c
  usci_b_spi.h
  wdt_a.c
  wdt_a.h
)
